name: AM Social Widget
author: Aamer Shahzad

sections.description:
AM Social Widget is a plugin that adds a new widget “AM Social Widget” to the WordPress Admin Screen under appearance->widgets. User can then add the widget to show links to their social profiles.

Feather Light

Unlike many other plugins, AM Social Widget does not use image icons or seperate icon fonts for its social icons. It uses latest SVG technique to create icons and are light weight and fast loading. It does not effect the speed of your site.

Available Social Profiles

User can add following social profiles to their sites.

  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • linkedin
  • Pinterest
  • Google Plus
  • Youtube
  • RSS Feed

Plugin Settings

There are no plugin settings, All the options are available in the widget screen.
sections.installation: Installation is easy and simple read the Plugin Documentation for demo and plugin setup.
sections.faq:
We’d love to hear your bug reports, feature suggestions and any other feedback! Please head over to the wpthemecraft support forum page to search for existing issues or open a new one. We will also fix the issues reported here on the plugin forum.

Can I change widget title?

Yes, you can change widget title.

Does this plugin have any settings page?

No, this plugin does not have any settings page.

Can I open link in new tab?

Yes you can check the “open link in new tab” checkbox to open all links in new tab.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1 – 2019-02-15

  • Release – First release of the plugin.
  • Release Notes: http://wpthemecraft.com/releases/release-notes-am-social-widget-free-1-0-1/
